name: Mei Can
description:
MeiCan plugin for IntelliJ based IDEs.


GitHub | Issues


Features:

  • Order a meal
  • View order information
  • Remind before order ends
  • Automatic ordering before order end
notes:

  • Support more tab options

  • Remove useless class
